subject: Baseball
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: With a four-seam fastball that regularly touches 100 miles an hour, a nasty slider and a tricky changeup, Stephen Strasburg is a likely Olympian and top draft pick.
snippet: With a four-seam fastball that regularly touches 100 miles an hour, a nasty slider and a tricky changeup, Stephen Strasburg is a likely Olympian and top draft pick.
